episodes.title: Why do people join cults? Book Reflections on Uncultured: A Memoir by Daniella Mestyanek Young
episodes.description:
00:00 Intro
00:11 Welcome
01:22 The first rule of cults is you are never in a cult
01:54 Banned in Singapore...
03:19 Non-trinitarian Christians?
07:42 Why I left my evangelical megachurch...
09:43 Cults are on a continuum...
10:29 Groups can become cults...
12:05 Misogyny in church...
14:48 Questions for my audience
14:57 How to support my channel
15:14 Outro

This was a difficult but important read. Everyone should get a copy of "Uncultured: A Memoir" by Daniella Mestyanek Young, and understand that people don't join cults. They join groups. And sometimes, groups become cults.

You can learn more about this book from: https://us.macmillan.com/books/9781250280114/uncultured/

If you'd like to support this channel and see more of such videos, please feel free to donate to my Ko-fi at: https://ko-fi.com/makanandmeaning

You can also buy me a book, link in the bio.

Disclaimer: This video was NOT sponsored. I bought the book, pasta, and orange juice with my personal funds.

Subscriber count: 5
